group_1.narration: ...Whatever, this isn't about me.@I just had some stuff I wanted@to think about, okay?
Looking back won't change the past...@Even Rena knows that much.
But you've got some of those moments too, right?@Like, "If only I'd done this back then"...@Those kinds of regrets.
...Rena's regret is that she didn't know.
I couldn't see a thing back then.
Kaede, Momoko, what it meant to be a Magical Girl...@None of it.
...And back then,@I didn't even understand my own feelings.
